content.married: If you have checked the spouse's record and completed any necessary actions, you can end this task.
content.civilpartnership: If you have checked the civil partner's record and completed any necessary actions, you can end this task.
content.widowed-yes:
If you have checked the late spouse or partner's record and updated the claimant’s State Pension award, you can end this task.

A letter will be sent to the claimant telling them that their State Pension has increased based on the change to their marital status.
content.widowed-no: If you have checked the late spouse or partner's record and there is no change to the claimant’s State Pension, you can end this task.
content.deatharrears: If you have sent a BR330 form to the person dealing with the estate, you can end this task.
content.deathoverpayment: If you have referred the overpayment to the debt management service, you can end this task.
